name: PPM America Capital Partners
overview: PPM America, Inc. is a privately owned investment manager. The firm primarily provides its services to other pooled investment vehicles and corporations. It also caters to high net worth individuals, investment companies and pension and profit sharing plans. The firm manages separate client-focused equity and fixed income portfolios. It manages mutual fund for its clients. The fund invests in the public equity and fixed income markets across the globe. It primarily invests in value stocks of small-cap, mid-cap and large-cap companies. The fund employs a fundamental analysis along with combination top-down and bottom-up stock picking approach to create its portfolios. It operates as a subsidiary of Jackson National Life Insurance Company. PPM America was founded in 1990 and is based in Chicago, Illinois with additional offices in Schaumburg, Illinois and New York, New York.
